label_prompts.control_on: User requests to activate or turn on a scene element
label_prompts.control_off: User requests to deactivate or turn off a scene element
label_prompts.control_value: User requests to set a numeric control like brightness contrast or implant size
label_prompts.info_definition: User asks what something is or its definition
label_prompts.info_location: User asks where something is or which side
label_prompts.size_request: User asks for implants without giving size and needs clarification
